name: Bone N Soul
description:
An object from beyond space has crashed into Earth and given fuel to humanity's biggest desires. Two beings past their lives have risen to bring back humanity's future into their own hands.

Game Features:

  • Gameplay tailored for a Co-op metroidvania experience.
  • More of a solo dude? Switch control of your characters at any time in the Single Player mode!
  • Take control of monsters and use their unique moves to help your journey.

  • Use spells to damage enemies or enhance your ally's strength.

  • Customize your playstile with a variety of items.
